verses.verse: Now gather <WH1413> <WH8704> thyself in troops <WH1416>, O daughter <WH1323> of troops <WH1416>: he hath laid <WH7760> <WH8804> siege <WH4692> against us: they shall smite <WH5221> <WH8686> the judge <WH8199> <WH8802> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> with a rod <WH7626> upon the cheek <WH3895>.

But thou, Beit-Lechem <WH1035> Ephratah <WH672>, though thou be little <WH6810> among the thousands <WH505> of Y'hudah <WH3063>, yet out of thee shall he come forth <WH3318> <WH8799> unto me that is to be ruler <WH4910> <WH8802> in Yisra'EL <WH3478>; whose goings forth <WH4163> have been from of old <WH6924>, from everlasting <WH3117> <WH5769>.

Therefore will he give them up <WH5414> <WH8799>, until the time <WH6256> that she which travaileth <WH3205> <WH8802> hath brought forth <WH3205> <WH8804>: then the remnant <WH3499> of his brethren <WH251> shall return <WH7725> <WH8799> unto the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>.

And he shall stand <WH5975> <WH8804> and feed <WH7462> <WH8804> in the strength <WH5797> of the YY <WH3068>, in the majesty <WH1347> of the name <WH8034> of the YY <WH3068> his 'Elohim <WH430>; and they shall abide <WH3427> <WH8804>: for now shall he be great <WH1431> <WH8799> unto the ends <WH657> of the earth <WH776>.

And this man shall be the peace <WH7965>, when the Ashurn <WH804> shall come <WH935> <WH8799> into our land <WH776>: and when he shall tread <WH1869> <WH8799> in our palaces <WH759>, then shall we raise <WH6965> <WH8689> against him seven <WH7651> shepherds <WH7462> <WH8802>, and eight <WH8083> principal <WH5257> men <WH120>.

And they shall waste <WH7462> <WH8804> the land <WH776> of Ashur <WH804> with the sword <WH2719>, and the land <WH776> of Nimrod <WH5248> in the entrances <WH6607> thereof: thus shall he deliver <WH5337> <WH8689> us from the Ashurn <WH804>, when he cometh <WH935> <WH8799> into our land <WH776>, and when he treadeth <WH1869> <WH8799> within our borders <WH1366>.

And the remnant <WH7611> of Ya`akov <WH3290> shall be in the midst <WH7130> of many <WH7227> people <WH5971> as a dew <WH2919> from the YY <WH3068>, as the showers <WH7241> upon the grass <WH6212>, that tarrieth <WH6960> <WH8762> not for man <WH376>, nor waiteth <WH3176> <WH8762> for the sons <WH1121> of men <WH120>.

And the remnant <WH7611> of Ya`akov <WH3290> shall be among the goyim <WH1471> in the midst <WH7130> of many <WH7227> people <WH5971> as a lion <WH738> among the beasts <WH929> of the forest <WH3293>, as a young lion <WH3715> among the flocks <WH5739> of sheep <WH6629>: who, if he go through <WH5674> <WH8804>, both treadeth down <WH7429> <WH8804>, and teareth in pieces <WH2963> <WH8804>, and none can deliver <WH5337> <WH8688>.
Thine hand <WH3027> shall be lifted up <WH7311> <WH8799> upon thine adversaries <WH6862>, and all thine enemies <WH341> <WH8802> shall be cut off <WH3772> <WH8735>.

And it shall come to pass in that day <WH3117>, saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH3068>, that I will cut off <WH3772> <WH8689> thy horses <WH5483> out of the midst <WH7130> of thee, and I will destroy <WH6> <WH8689> thy chariots <WH4818>:
And I will cut off <WH3772> <WH8689> the cities <WH6145> <WH8676> <WH5892> of thy land <WH776>, and throw down <WH2040> <WH8804> all thy strong holds <WH4013>:
And I will cut off <WH3772> <WH8689> witchcrafts <WH3785> out of thine hand <WH3027>; and thou shalt have no more soothsayers <WH6049> <WH8781>:

Thy graven images <WH6456> also will I cut off <WH3772> <WH8689>, and thy standing images <WH4676> out of the midst <WH7130> of thee; and thou shalt no more worship <WH7812> <WH8691> the work <WH4639> of thine hands <WH3027>.
And I will pluck up <WH5428> <WH8804> thy groves <WH842> out of the midst <WH7130> of thee: so will I destroy <WH8045> <WH8689> thy cities <WH6145> <WH8676> <WH5892>.
And I will execute <WH6213> <WH8804> vengeance <WH5359> in anger <WH639> and fury <WH2534> upon the heathen <WH1471>, such as they have not heard <WH8085> <WH8804>.
